name: No Way Back (eprozorov)
description:
No way back!

You will find yourself inside a broken tank.. Try to survive, repair and upgrade yourself, kill all enemies and solve a main mistery: What Is Inside The Box?

The game by Lev & Evgeny Prozorov.

Art - Alexander Mikhailov.
Sound - Pavel Charushin.

Made for The Web Monetization Challenge 2020.
